service.title: Customer Service
service.intro: Our team is available to answer your questions and assist you.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept bank cards (Visa, Mastercard), PayPal, and gift cards.

payment.question: Is online payment secure?
payment.answer: Yes, all transactions are protected by an SSL protocol and banking verification systems.

payment.question: Can I pay in installments?
payment.answer: We offer payment in 3 installments without fees through our financial partner.

payment.question: How do I use a promo code or gift card?
payment.answer: You can enter your promo code or gift card number during payment, before confirming the order.

orders.question: How do I place an order?
orders.answer: Add your products to the cart, validate your cart, then follow the payment and delivery steps.

orders.question: Can I modify or cancel my order?
orders.answer: Yes, as long as your order has not been shipped, you can modify or cancel it from your customer account.

orders.question: How do I know if my order is confirmed?
orders.answer: You will receive a confirmation email with the summary of your order.

orders.question: Can I order without creating an account?
orders.answer: Yes, it is possible to order as a guest, but we recommend creating an account to track your orders.

delivery.question: What are the delivery times?
delivery.answer: Standard delivery takes 2 to 5 business days. An express option is available within 24/48h.

delivery.question: Do you deliver internationally?
delivery.answer: Yes, we deliver to most countries. Delivery times and fees vary depending on the destination.

delivery.question: What are the delivery fees?
delivery.answer: Delivery fees are automatically calculated during payment based on weight and destination.

delivery.question: How can I track my order?
delivery.answer: A tracking number will be sent to you by email once your package has been shipped.

returns.question: Can I return a perfume if I donâ€™t like it?
returns.answer: Yes, you have 14 days after receipt to make a return, provided the product is intact and unopened.

returns.question: How do I make a return or exchange?
returns.answer: Log in to your customer account, select the relevant order, and follow the return instructions.

returns.question: Are return costs at my expense?
returns.answer: Return costs are free if the product is defective or non-compliant. Otherwise, they are at your expense.

returns.question: When will I be refunded after a return?
returns.answer: The refund is made within 7 business days after receipt and verification of the returned product.

about.title: Who are we?
about.paragraph1: Our story begins with a friendship. Friends for over ten years, we share a common passion for the world of perfume and the elegance it represents.
about.paragraph2: This passion has grown over time through discussions, discoveries, and a constant curiosity for scents and their evocative power.
about.paragraph3: Over the years, the idea of creating our own perfume business became obvious. We wanted to build a place where each fragrance is carefully selected.
about.paragraph4: Our approach is based on a rigorous selection of perfumes that stand out for their character, subtlety, and quality.
about.paragraph5: We believe perfume reveals identity, accompanies lifeâ€™s important moments, and leaves a lasting impression.
about.paragraph6: Today, our brand reflects our friendship, our complementarity, and our shared ambition.
